DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: The investigators want to study whether parathyroid hormone improves healing of humerus after a fracture. The investigators will assess healing of the humerus with Constant score.
DOC.brief_title: Parathyroid Hormone for the Treatment of Humerus Fractures
DOC.criteria: proximal humeral fracture eligible for conservative treatment. able to understand the protocol signs an informed consent liver disease kidney disease severe osteoporosis malignant disease bone metabolic disease oral treatment with bisphosphonates during the last 3 months. treatment with Denosumab during the last 6 months. intravenous treatment with bisphosphonates during the last 12 months.
